articles.description: Hawthorn will be headed by a captaincy bolter in 2021, replacing retired skipper Ben Stratton
articles.content:
HAWTHORN has landed a captaincy shock by announcing dual premiership ruckman Ben McEvoy as the club's 37th skipper.
McEvoy, 31, won the players' vote on Wednesday with his position ratified by the c… [+2208 chars]

articles.title: ‘It felt like it was the first day at school’: Benji Marshall seals South Sydney move - Fox Sports
articles.description: The South Sydney Rabbitohs have handed Benji Marshall an NRL lifeline after signing the Kiwi international on a one-year deal.
articles.content:
Marshall, 36, was released by the Wests Tigers at the end of last season and despite offers from Hull FC and North Queensland, the veteran playmaker opted to stay in Sydney.

articles.title: They're back! Alexander-Arnold and Liverpool shrug off recent wobble to make a statement at Tottenham - Goal.com
